What is real-life room escape?

Have you ever played room escape games on your computer? Your smart-phones or tablets? nextRelic room escape has brought this idea to real life! The basic idea is that your group will have 60 minutes to find a way out of mysterious rooms filled countless puzzles. The whole process is accomplished by using talents and logic, searching for clues and using unique items in the room to help you get through obstacles like locks and doors, or even hidden passages! Once the team makes it through all of the puzzles and mechanics contained within the room, you will find the final key that unlock yourself to freedom!

The adventure is extremely thrilling, but not dangerous at all. It requires no physical exertion or any engineering backgrounds, and is suitable for all ages! Our game design is unique in the genre (room escape games), because it focuses on the puzzle and experiments with real objects, rather than being based on a specific theme or story (in another word, it is more like an adventure rather than a theme park!). It is an exciting recreational activity for couples, friends, families and tourists. It is also gaining popularity as a unique and fun corporate team-building event or out of the classroom learning activity for students.

Our escape room is originally designed to maximize players adventurous experience. The game accommodates groups of 2-8 players, the game contains no danger elements and is fun and unique for players to challenge. Our designs promote team-playing and cooperation, therefore, solo fighter has no chance! Everybody should do their own part and each individual's talents are required in order to find the "relic" (key item) to proceed. So, what are you still waiting for? Can you and your fellow team members find the "next relic" to gain your final freedom? The mysterious nextRelic room-escape awaits for your challenge!
